name: file_change_frequency
description: This metric tracks the frequency of changes made to files in commits, identifying which files are changed most often.

dimensions.name: changed_files
dimensions.description: The number of files changed in a commit.

measures.name: change_frequency
measures.description: The number of times a file change count occurs in commits.

sample_questions: Which file had the most changes and how often was it changed?
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT changed_files, COUNT(*) as change_frequency FROM commits.commits GROUP BY changed_files ORDER BY change_frequency DESC LIMIT 100;
